quote: Sen. Richard Blumenthal… now misrepresents what Judge Gorsuch told him?
quotePlain: Sen. Richard Blumenthal… now misrepresents what Judge Gorsuch told him?
name: Donald Trump

checks.short: The Gorsuch comments were later corroborated.
checks.shortPlain: The Gorsuch comments were later corroborated.

checks.short: A spokesman for Gorsuch later confirmed to CNN that the judge used the terms “disheartening” and “demoralizing” to describe Trump's tweets during his meeting with the Blumenthal.
checks.shortPlain: A spokesman for Gorsuch later confirmed to CNN that the judge used the terms “disheartening” and “demoralizing” to describe Trump’s tweets during his meeting with the Blumenthal.

checks.quote: Not so. Cuomo, a CNN host, brought up that issue upfront with Blumenthal on Thursday. Cuomo asked him about Trump’s belief that the senator has no credibility “because you misrepresented your military record in the past.” Blumenthal did not answer the question, but went on to talk about his meeting with Judge Gorsuch.
checks.quotePlain: Not so. Cuomo, a CNN host, brought up that issue upfront with Blumenthal on Thursday. Cuomo asked him about Trump’s belief that the senator has no credibility “because you misrepresented your military record in the past.” Blumenthal did not answer the question, but went on to talk about his meeting with Judge Gorsuch.

claims.title: Sen. Blumenthal misrepresented Niel Gorsuch
claims.negative: Sen. Blumenthal did not misrepresent Niel Gorsuch
claims.negativePlain: Sen. Blumenthal did not misrepresent Niel Gorsuch
claims.truth: The Gorsuch comments were later corroborated.
